Key Match Events: Trent Boult was named Player of the Match
Sri Lanka scored 171 runs in 46.4 overs
New Zealand won by 5 wickets with 160 balls remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under lights at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
Others: The match was the 41st of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24, and New Zealand elected to field first
